Name: sulfur dioxide production, liquid | sulfur dioxide, liquid | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: There are widely varying processes for the production of liquid SO2. In this dataset, the SO2 production from the combustion of sulfur is chosen as the representative process: sulfur from natural deposits or from sulfur recovery is combusted in a chamber. The SO2 gas content is generally up to 18% by volume. This process is exothermic.;Chemical reaction formula:;S + O2 (g) → SO2;References:;Althaus H.-J., Chudacoff M., Hischier R., Jungbluth N., Osses M. and Primas A. (2007) Life Cycle Inventories of Chemicals. Final report ecoinvent data v2.0 No. 8. Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH.
